subtitleNullable: Categorized images from India's traditional and state famous food items.
descriptionNullable:
## Warning : You might get hungry! ## Inspiration Indian meal is a magical explosion of contrasting flavours and foods. There are many regional cuisines in India, each with a history up to 5,000 years old. The food eaten in different parts of India is shaped by :
  • Geography and climate: providing a varying array of ingredients for people to eat at different times of the year.
  • History: of trade and migration, evidence of the many cultures and peoples who brought new foods to India.
## Content The `dataset` has been divided into **train** and **val** by default to ease user's process of navigating files. It has 20 state famous food categories inside which images of that particular food item are present. It further has a `test` directory fully categorized in the same manner as train and val. It has been carefully made for you to test your model on new and uncrafted images of our yummy dataset. Then finally, an optional `Model` directory has Inception v3 model using transfer learning to predict images and play around. Good luck, Have fun! ## Challenge Now the images which which I have collected are cleaned and has been a challenging journey due to multiple food items being present in our dishes. We have sides with many dishes which are constant for some food items. This can be challenging for model to focus on areas of food items rather than their sides.
title: Indian Food Images (Top 20)
subtitle: Categorized images from India's traditional and state famous food items.
description:
## Warning : You might get hungry! ## Inspiration Indian meal is a magical explosion of contrasting flavours and foods. There are many regional cuisines in India, each with a history up to 5,000 years old. The food eaten in different parts of India is shaped by :
  • Geography and climate: providing a varying array of ingredients for people to eat at different times of the year.
  • History: of trade and migration, evidence of the many cultures and peoples who brought new foods to India.
## Content The `dataset` has been divided into **train** and **val** by default to ease user's process of navigating files. It has 20 state famous food categories inside which images of that particular food item are present. It further has a `test` directory fully categorized in the same manner as train and val. It has been carefully made for you to test your model on new and uncrafted images of our yummy dataset. Then finally, an optional `Model` directory has Inception v3 model using transfer learning to predict images and play around. Good luck, Have fun! ## Challenge Now the images which which I have collected are cleaned and has been a challenging journey due to multiple food items being present in our dishes. We have sides with many dishes which are constant for some food items. This can be challenging for model to focus on areas of food items rather than their sides.
